attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE NEED TO PUT A STOP TO IMMIGRATION, TILL WE CAN SORT OUT WHO HAS COME HERE. WE NEED PROPER BORDER CONTROLS, KNOWING WHO HAS ARRIVED AND WHO HAS LEFT. WE NEED TOO LET IN PEOPLE WHO ARE A BENIFIT TO THIS COUNTRY NOT PEOPLE WHO ARE A DRAIN. WE MUST STOP CRIMINALS AND FREELOADERS ENTERING. WE SHOULD STOP WASTING TAXPAYERS MONEY ON THOSE WHO HAVE NO RIGHT TO IT.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/refuges/
If you do decide to resubmit then please do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
